reactiveairplanemode.pwittchen.github.com.library

Class ReactiveAirplaneMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactiveairplanemode.pwittchen.github.com.library.ReactiveAirplaneMode

  • public class ReactiveAirplaneMode
extends java.lang.Object
    ReactiveAirplaneMode is an Android library listening airplane mode with RxJava Observables.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static ReactiveAirplaneMode create()
        Creates an instance of ReactiveAirplaneMode class
        Returns:
        ReactiveAirplaneMode object

      • getAndObserve

        public <any> getAndObserve(android.content.Context context)
        Emits current state of the Airplane Mode in the beginning of the subscription and then Observes Airplane Mode state of the device with BroadcastReceiver. RxJava2 Observable emits true if the airplane mode turns on and false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        context - of the Application or Activity
        Returns:
        RxJava2 Observable with Boolean value indicating state of the airplane mode

      • observe

        public <any> observe(android.content.Context context)
        Observes Airplane Mode state of the device with BroadcastReceiver. RxJava2 Observable emits true if the airplane mode turns on and false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        context - of the Application or Activity
        Returns:
        RxJava2 Observable with Boolean value indicating state of the airplane mode

        Creates IntentFilter for BroadcastReceiver

      • createBroadcastReceiver

        protected android.content.BroadcastReceiver createBroadcastReceiver(<any> emitter)
        Creates BroadcastReceiver for monitoring airplane mode
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        BroadcastReceiver

      • tryToUnregisterReceiver

        protected void tryToUnregisterReceiver(android.content.BroadcastReceiver receiver,
                                       android.content.Context context)
        Tries to unregister BroadcastReceiver. Calls onError(java.lang.String, java.lang.Exception) method if receiver was already unregistered
        Parameters:
        receiver - BroadcastReceiver
        context - of the Application or Activity

        public <any> get(android.content.Context context)
        Gets airplane mode state wrapped within a Single type
        Parameters:
        context - of the Application or Activity
        Returns:
        RxJava2 Single with Boolean value indicating state of the airplane mode

      • isAirplaneModeOn

        public boolean isAirplaneModeOn(android.content.Context context)
        Checks airplane mode once basing on the system settings. Returns true if airplane mode is on or false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        context - of the Activity or Application
        Returns:
        boolean value indicating state of the airplane mode.
